subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: DALLAS, March 6 — Before the start of the season, the Nets and the Dallas Mavericks were considered contenders for their conference titles and perhaps the N.B.A. championship. Less than two weeks into the season, the Nets appeared to be the more serious contender after the Mavericks lost their first four games.
